data.actual_result: The link isn't recognized, the Join button is still locked as if you typed nonsense stuff
data.expected_result: It shouldn't be case sensitive so the invite should count as valid and let you go to invite screen
data.short_description: In "Join a server" screen, full Discord server URLs that contains uppercase characters before the invite code aren't recognized as valid invite (the Join button won't unlock)
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll down in server list - Tap + button and Join a server - Input a full server URL with an uppercase character in the domain name, e.g https://diScord[.]gg/invitecode - Tap Join
